title: [转载][机制][NPS] RandomSpawnpoint —— 随机重生 [开源][1.0.0]
author: Actahedral
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wode490390 于 2019-12-7 18:42 编辑 

介绍：
本插件可以让流浪的玩家随机在自定义的范围内重生。

使用：
将本插件丢进服务端plugins文件夹内，重新启动服务器即可。没有任何命令与权限

配置：
config.yml
#自定义范围
'spawnRange' : '900'复制代码下载：

日记：3.0.0（18.9.6）：
Changed the method to teleport and get the highest point of a coordinate
Changed the method to prevent existing players being teleported away from where they were
Added another file
Added a way to track down old players and new players
Fixed error: Unable to change the HashSet stored in playerList.yml
Prevented the bug where sometimes the plugin drop player from sky high and killed them
Updated API to 1.0.7
2.0.0（18.7.28）：

3.0.0（2018.9.6）：
Changed the method to teleport and get the highest point of a coordinate
Changed the method to prevent existing players being teleported away from where they were
Added another file
Added a way to track down old players and new players

Prevented the bug where sometimes the plugin drop player from sky high and killed them
